analyzed: śalyaparva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_9.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet

original: evaṃ jambha ivendreṇa hate karṇe kirīṭinā /
analyzed: evam jambhe iva indreṇa hate karṇe kirīṭinā
yuddham nyavedayat rājñe punar abhyetya saṃjayaḥ
śekhare sarva vīrāṇām arthinām kalpapādape
hate vaikartane rājan sarva āśā rajanī kṛti
tadā ātmanā gate kvāpi nija jīvaḥ iva ākulaḥ

original: duryodhano nirucchvāso mene śūnyā diśo daśa // Bhmj_9.4 //
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ nirucchvāsaḥ mene śūnyāḥ diśaḥ daśa
cacāra rathinām madhye pāṇḍavān yoddhum udyataḥ
pareṇa eva śarīreṇa para loka gataḥ naraḥ

original: tato drauṇigirā kṛtvā śalyaṃ senāpatiṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: tatas drauṇi girā kṛtvā śalyam senāpatim nṛpaḥ
raṇam vitara
rājya arthe viveśa tridaśālayam
rathānām ayutam sāgram tāvat eva ca dantinām

original: lakṣyadvayaṃ dvayānāṃ ca tisraḥ koṭyaḥ padātinām // Bhmj_9.7 //
analyzed: lakṣya dvayam dvayānām ca tisraḥ koṭyaḥ padātinām
sainya śeṣam abhūt etat kururājasya saṃgare
pāṇḍavānām ca hata śeṣam abhūt balam
asmin āyodhane ghore rājñām saṃhāra maṇḍale
mastiṣka kardama luṭhat patti syandana kuñjare
ākīrṇa vaktra kamale raṅga udbhaṅga ratha aṅgake
visrasta ārā jaṃsa oghe khaṅga khaṇḍa utpala ākule
keśa śevāla jambāla śeṣa kīlāla picchile
akāla kāla kariṇā sarasi iva viloḍite
srasta vara aśva karṇa aṅke bhagna bāṇāsana āvṛte
kadalī śakala ālole vane vajraiḥ iva āhate
udyāne iva kālasya kapāla caṣaka ākule
punar pravṛtte samare śalya hārdikya sauvalāḥ
viviśuḥ pāṇḍava camūm kṛpa drauṇi suyodhanāḥ
pārtha pārṣata śaineya draupadeya śikhaṇḍinaḥ
jaghnuḥ trigarta gāndhāra kapi nātha varūthinīḥ
amaryāde raṇe tasmin kṣībāḥ iva mahā rathāḥ
kruddhāḥ yuyudhire ghoram hata bandhu suhṛd gaṇāḥ

original: satyasenaṃ suṣeṇaṃ ca citrasenaṃ ca karṇajam /
analyzed: satyasenam suṣeṇam ca citrasenam ca karṇa jam
jaghāna nakulaḥ vīrān karṇa tulya parākramān
tatas śalyena balinā gajena iva sarojinī
mṛdyamānā sa nirghoṣā cakampe pāṇḍu vāhinī
śalyena ripu śalyena ā vadhyamānām varūthinīm
dṛṣṭvā bhīmaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ bhīma kopaḥ tam ādravat

original: sa hatvā gadayā tasya rathaṃ rathaśatacchidaḥ /
analyzed: sa hatvā gadayā tasya ratham ratha śata chidaḥ
mumūrṣoḥ daṇḍam udyamya tasthau kālaḥ iva agratas
ādāya madra rājaḥ u pi gadām cāmīkara aṅgadām
bhīmam bhīma balaḥ kopāt darpa uddhatam ayodhayat
maṇḍalāni carantau tau abhipatya parasparam
ghāta jāta sphuliṅgābhyām gadābhyām abhijaghnatuḥ
tayoḥ mūrcchitayoḥ kṣipram mohāt patitayoḥ bhuvi
sa anugāḥ tūrṇam ājagmuḥ saṃrabdhāḥ kuru pāṇḍavāḥ
saṃjñām avāpya sahasā yathāvat sthitayoḥ tayoḥ
duryodhana mukhāḥ vīrāḥ pārtha mukhyān ayodhayan
brahma loka abhikāmeṣu yudhyamāneṣu rājasu
suyodhanaḥ cekitānam avadhīt bhūbhujām varam
madra rājaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ pāṇḍū putrān saha anugān
avārayat balāt ekaḥ pūjyamānaḥ nabhaścaraiḥ
śastra vṛṣṭim tad utsṛṣṭām chittvā bāṇaiḥ asaṃbhramaḥ
muhurtāt vidadhe śalyaḥ tān adṛśyān patatribhiḥ
chādite śara jālena sainye madra mahībhujā
kruddhaḥ vadhīt sahasre dve rathānām dharmanandanaḥ
dṛṣṭvā anugān hatān rājñā śalyaḥ yudhi yudhiṣṭhiram
śilīmukha śataiḥ pūrṇam atha aśokam iva akarot
pīḍite dharmatanaye nakulaḥ kopa kampitaḥ
bhīma sātyaki mukhyāḥ ca śaraiḥ śalyam avākiran
tatas śara andhakāreṇa sthagayan bhuvana udaram
unmamāthaḥ ghana dhvānaḥ śalyaḥ pārtha varūthinīm
ākulaḥ samare tasmin jiṣṇuḥ draiṇim ayodhayat
duryodhanam bhīmasenaḥ nakulaḥ subala ātmajam
kṣapita aśeṣa nṛpateḥ śalyasya atha yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: chittvāyudhāni sarvāṇi tilaśo vidadhe ratham // Bhmj_9.33 //
analyzed: chittvā āyudhāni sarvāṇi tilaśas vidadhe ratham
aparam ratham āsthāya madra rājaḥ krudhā jvalan
cakāra dharmatanayam kṛtta cāpa ratha dhvajam
bhīmasenaḥ tha viratham dṛṣṭvā rājānam ākulaḥ

original: cakarta madrarājasya rathaṃ sarvāyudhaiḥ saha // Bhmj_9.35 //
analyzed: cakarta madra rājasya ratham sarva āyudhaiḥ saha
khaḍga hastaḥ tatas śalyaḥ nighnan syandana kuñjarān
cacāra alakṣita tanuḥ margaiḥ garuḍa vikramaḥ
atha jvālāyamānena śoṇa paṭṭena guṇṭhitām
bhrājiṣṇu ratna khacitām mṛtyoḥ danta āvalīm iva
etad antam kuru balam yuddham evaṃvidham kutas
iti iva ghaṇṭā paṭalaiḥ krośantīm aśani svanām
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ sahasraghnim dīptām ṣaṣ mukha vikramaḥ
prāhiṇot madra rājāya śaktim śaktimatām varaḥ

original: sa tayā bhinnahṛdayaḥ papāta kṣmābhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: sa tayā bhinna hṛdayaḥ papāta kṣmābhṛtām varaḥ
śrotra nāsā āsya vivara sravat rudhira nirjharaḥ
śalye hate kauravāṇām āśā śeṣa avalambane
rathinaḥ dudruvuḥ sarve bhagna māna manorathāḥ
tatas śalya anujaḥ kruddhaḥ vicitrakavaca abhidhaḥ
abhyāyāyau dharmarājam dārayantam anīkinīm
pṛṣatka varṣiṇaḥ tasya citra ratna ujjvalam śiraḥ
rohaṇa adreḥ iva uttuṅgam śṛṅgam ciccheda dharmajaḥ
tasmin hate bhajyamānām nātha hīnām patākinīm
parāvṛtya kṛpa drauṇi hārdikyāḥ tūrṇam āyayuḥ
nadadbhiḥ cedi pāñcālaiḥ labdha lakṣyaiḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: te muhūrtaṃ yuyudhire prayātā bahutāmiva // Bhmj_9.45 //
analyzed: te muhūrtam yuyudhire prayātāḥ bahu tām iva
tatas svāmi vadha āmarṣāt yudhiṣṭhiram abhidrutān

original: hatvā śeṣānaho madrānamadrāṃ pṛthivīṃ vyadhāt // Bhmj_9.46 //
analyzed: hatvā śeṣān aho madrān a madrām pṛthivīm vyadhāt
atha bhīmaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ nipuṇaḥ kṣaya karmasu
niṣpiṣya mlecchān sarvān ca raṇam śūnyam iva akarot
tatas sātyakinā vīre satya rāje nipātite
svayam duryodhanaḥ bhyetya pāṇḍu putrān ayodhayat

original: na ratho na gajo nāśvo na yodhaḥ pāṇḍaveṣvabhūt /
analyzed: na rathaḥ na gajaḥ na aśvaḥ na yodhaḥ pāṇḍaveṣu abhūt
haima nāma aṅkitaiḥ vyāptaḥ yaḥ na duryodhana iṣubhiḥ
cakampe kuñjara kulam tasya nārāca varṣiṇaḥ
maṇi kāñcana jhāṅkāra tāra maurvī ravaiḥ muhur
duryodhane yudhyamāne labdha lakṣyaiḥ arātibhiḥ
āyayuḥ draiṇi hārdikya suśarma kṛpa saubalāḥ
ghore raṇa vyatikare teṣām nibiḍa pātinām
nirālokaḥ bhavat lokaḥ rajasā saṃvṛte ravau
kuñjara indra taṭāghāta kṣame rajasi duḥsahe
vibhāgaḥ na abhavat kaścid kalpa apāye iva āgate

original: kva drauṇiḥ kva ca gāndhāraḥ kva ca rājā suyodhanaḥ /
analyzed: kva drauṇiḥ kva ca gāndhāraḥ kva ca rājā suyodhanaḥ
iti abhūt vipulaḥ śabdaḥ pāṇḍu senāsu sarvatas
tasmin muhūrte pralaya āvarta saṃkrānta gocare
jaghāna mārutasutaḥ śeṣān duryodhana anujān
mahābāhum bhūribalam jaitram durdarśanam śalam

original: sunādaṃ ca sa hatvā tānunnanāda kṣayocitān // Bhmj_9.56 //
analyzed: sunādam ca sa hatvā tān unnanāda kṣaya ucitān
tatas mām agrahīt vīraḥ sātyakiḥ vinarale raṇe

original: saṃjayo 'yaṃ mayā labdho nigadyeti sasaṃbhramam // Bhmj_9.57 //
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ yam mayā labdhaḥ nigadya iti sa saṃbhramam
atha arjunaḥ suśarmāṇam sa putram sa padānugam
hatvā saṃśaptaka anīkam niḥśeṣam viśikhaiḥ vyadhāt
dyūte raṇa abhidhe tasmin sāyaka akṣān kṣipan muhur
sahadeva ūrdhacandreṇa jahāra śakuneḥ śiraḥ
ulūkam tad sutam hatvā gāndhārāṇām anīkinīm
jaghāna mādrī tanayaḥ vana vāsa daśām smaran
atha niḥśeṣite sainye śrāntaḥ nihata vāhanaḥ
apasṛtya raṇāt prāyāt padbhyām rājā suyodhanaḥ
kṛtavarma kṛpa drauṇi śeṣe tasmin mahā raṇe
kṣaṇāt aśeṣa tām yāte bhūta vetāla maṇḍale
dhṛṣṭadyumnasya vacasā mām nihantum samudyate
śaineye bhagavān vyāsaḥ rarakṣa karuṇā nidhiḥ
tatas dina ante śoka ārtaḥ prasthitaḥ ham suyodhanam
apaśyam vajra hṛdayam prayāntam cakravartinam
sa pāda cārī mām dṛṣṭvā lajjā kuṭila kandharaḥ

original: ūce saṃjayarājānaṃ brūyāstvaṃ janakaṃ mama // Bhmj_9.65 //
analyzed: ūce saṃjaya rājānam brūyāḥ tvam janakam mama

original: tena karṇena suhṛdā taiśca vīrairvinā kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tena karṇena suhṛdā taiḥ ca vīraiḥ vinā kṛtaḥ

original: hradaṃ praviṣṭaḥ putraste hīno duḥśāsanādibhiḥ // Bhmj_9.66 //
analyzed: hradam praviṣṭaḥ putraḥ te hīnaḥ duḥśāsana ādibhiḥ
mām iti uktvā sa saṃstambhya salilam daitya māyayā
hradam viveśa vipulam prauḍha śoka anala ākulaḥ

original: taṃ stambhitorusalile sarasi praviṣṭaṃ jñātvā girā mama gurostanayaḥ kṛpaśca /
analyzed: tam stambhita uru salile sarasi praviṣṭam jñātvā girā mama guroḥ tanayaḥ kṛpaḥ ca
bhojaḥ ca bhūpati śikhā maṇi līḍha pādam lakṣmī vilāsa sadanam śuśucuḥ tam etya

original: akṣauhiṇīparivṛto 'tha visṛjya gehaṃ rātrau yuyutsumakhilaiḥ saha rājadāraiḥ /
analyzed: akṣauhiṇī parivṛtaḥ tha visṛjya geham rātrau yuyutsum akhilaiḥ saha rāja dāraiḥ

original: dharmātmajastamṛṇaśeṣamiva pradadhyau duryodhanaṃ saha dhanaṃjayabhīmamukhyaiḥ // Bhmj_9.69 //
analyzed: dharmātmajaḥ tam ṛṇa śeṣam iva pradadhyau duryodhanam saha dhanaṃjaya bhīma mukhyaiḥ
yad pāda padma nakha candra marīci mālāḥ mālāḥ iva kṣitibhṛtām babhuḥ uttamāṅge

original: so 'pyeka eva kururājasutaḥ padātiryāto dhigāsthiravilāsavikāsi daivam // Bhmj_9.70 //
analyzed: saḥ pi ekaḥ eva kuru rāja sutaḥ padātiḥ yātaḥ dhik ā sthira vilāsa vikāsi daivam

original: yasyā vaśādbata natonnatabhāñji bhāvacakrāṇi hanta viśarārudaśāṃ viśanti /
analyzed: yasyāḥ vaśāt bata nata unnata bhāñji bhāva cakrāṇi hanta viśarāru daśām viśanti

original: saṃkrandanāni yativibhramamudritāni tasyai namo 'stu satataṃ bhavitavyatāyai // Bhmj_9.71 //
analyzed: saṃkrandanāni yati vibhrama mudritāni tasyai namaḥ stu satatam bhavitavya tāyai
iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām śalyaparva
